info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 11:57AM MDT until March 18 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Northwestern Otero County in south central New Mexico... Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico...
* Until 300 PM MDT.
* At 1156 AM MDT, an area of blowing dust was Dona Ana County.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong winds up to 55 mph.
SOURCE...Satellite imagery.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 111 and 162. Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 46. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 210. Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 20 and 48, and between mile markers 79 and 87.
Locations impacted include... Fort Selden State Historic Site, Hatch, Radium Springs, Mesilla, Dona Ana, Afton Generating Plant, San Miguel, Kilbourne Hole, Lake Lucero, Talavera, High Valley, Corralitos, Northrup Landing, East Mesa, Mesquite, Afton, Dripping Springs, Aden Crater, Leasburg Dam State Park, and Vado.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 3:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 3:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 11:57AM MDT until March 18 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 3:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 3:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
